ModMetaData.name: Fallout Races: Playable Supermutant(
ModMetaData.author: Stokeling9701
ModMetaData.description:
Supermutants are a stronger, tougher FEV mutated humanoid that need to eat more, but their strength lets them carry more as well as mine quicker. They have some innate armor due to their mutations and are immune to toxins. Nightkin are more stealthy and agile then a Supermutant, as well as being more intelligent. They do however, suffer greatly socially due to their stealth boy withdrawl induced paranoia.
Credits: Chicken plucker for his extremely detailed body retexture mod I used to make the super mutants look swole Ramrod for creating the original Ghouls fallout mod, which I used as a base for this. Mlie for updating the ghouls mod, as well as the Filthy Orc Invasion mod which i used for xml things. Barfcat for the head texture borrowed from I have No Mouth and I must Beauty and Ugly Greiger, who helped me stop hairs from spawning on the mutants heads, he also created the Aspero Dragon race. Myself for editing the XML files and slapping this heap together New ugly heads are from Beauty and Ugly, by Heeta. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2063838726
